name: Multiplayer Marble
description:
Multiplayer Marble (MM) is a digital translation of the classic marble game played all over the world.

Features
  • Marble Control
    • Aim
    • Spin
    • Power
  • Mulitplayer
    • LAN (Local)
    • Online (Steam)
How to Play Online
  1. You must install Steam and login.
  2. Start the game.
  3. In the Main Menu, switch from "LAN Mode" to "Internet Mode".
  4. Click "Play" to Host.
  5. Click "Find Games" to search for online servers.

NB: The Steam Overlay displays the game as "Spacewars". Don't worry, it won't affect your gameplay. This is because the game has yet to be Greenlit.

Rules

This is a pre-alpha prototype for a multiplayer marble game. In its current state the gameplay structure is totally open and we let you the players enforce your own rules.

Suggested rules to get you started:

  1. Play in turns.
  2. Each player has 5 lives.
  3. Enter "Target Mode" during your turn.
  4. To score and reduce a life; hit your opponent's marble and then visit the goal pit.
  5. Last surviving player wins.
Feedback

Feedback is much welcome. Let's play, discuss and build the game together!
